title: Body.Bags.1993.TV.FS.INT.DVDRip.XviD-DigX
description:
Movie Name   : Body Bags *XVID* (Body.Bags.1993.TV.FS.INT.DVDRip.XviD.avi)

DVD Date     : 7/25/2000

Runtime      : 95 mins

Rating       : User Rating: 5.6/10 (1,583 votes)

IMDB         : http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0106449/

ADDITIONAL   : We intentionally "ripped" this movie for a file size of
               900MB because we wanted to keep the quality high for this
               FULL SCREEN (FS) release.

P L O T   -   N O T E S  

   Three short stories in the horror genre The first about a serial killer The 
   second about a hair transplant going wrong The third about a base ball player.

   Slip into the crypt for a peek at the "necro-files" of director John Carpenter
   (Halloween, The Fog, Christine), in three dead-on tales from today&#039;s top
   terrormeister! Robert Carradine (The Player) and David Naughton (Witchboard II)
   pump-up for high-octane horror when a satanic serial killer stalks "The Gas
   Station." Stacy Keach (False Identity), Deborah Harry (Videodrome) and rock 
   superstar Sheena Eston wig-out in the hair-raising tale of tonsorial terror, 
   "Hair." And special guest director Tobe Hooper (Poltergeist) takes the reins 
   when Mark Hamill (Star Wars) and Twiggy (The Boyfriend) set their sights on 
   the supernatural and stare Evil right in "The Eye." So zip yourself up tight
   and chill out with host John Carpenter in the shock-around-the-clock scarefest
   that will keep you coming back for morgue!

C A S T   -   C R E W

  Sheena Easton
